name: Super Banzai
description:
Super Banzai is a game where clans of Ninja compete in death sports to bring honor to their clan's name. 

The game pits players represented as clans against one another each with a legion of ninjas available. 

There are 3 modes currently: Battle Royal, Team Deathmatch and a game mode called BasketBomb which is a deadly game of basketball where teams of 2 move a large bomb around the environment using weapon attacks and grappling hooks in order to get the bomb into the enemy team's goal. 

Super Banzai is a physics based multiplayer couch coop party brawler it is accessible but skill determines the winner more so then luck. Using air dashes and dynamic grappling hooks and destructible environments players will position themselves for the perfect strike to destroy their opponent or to launch the Bomb into the goal. Instant re-spawns, special attacks and merciless environments as dangerous as any player keep the action intense.

This is unfinished game being released in the near future.  Thank you for taking time to play it and I hope you enjoy it so far.
